Stoos Ridge Hike - Switzerland
13 June 2024
I went on one of the best hike of my life at Stoos Ridge in Switzerland. It took my wife and me 3 hours to complete, but it was totally worth it.
Map showing the route taken for the hike.
A 360-degree view of one of the many stunning scenes during the hike.
